alert.note: Alert for Big Stone (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 22 at 10:32AM CDT until April 23 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota...Minnesota... Minnesota River at Big Stone Lake affecting Roberts, Big Stone and Grant Counties. .For sites with a river forecast, the forecast includes precipitation through the next 24 hours. Any future precipitation could affect the forecasts. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River at Big Stone Lake. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 971.5 feet, Parks are flooded along Big Stone Lake. Water reaches several homes on the Ortonville peninsula. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 971.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM CDT Saturday was 971.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 970.8 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 971.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued Sunday by 100 AM CDT.
